content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #151

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add DICOM uid and FHIR patient reference in the message example

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Event Catalog (open-imaging-study, switch-imaging-study, close-imaging-study)
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Add DICOM uid and FHIR patient reference in the message example

Comment: I could not find the DICOM uid and FHIR patient reference in the message. I suggest adding them in the example.

If they are already added in the example, please add a comment in the message indicating their place.

The same applies to switch-imaging-study and close-imaging-study

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #151:

Proposed resolution: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed resolution comment: We will update the appropriate sample messages in the spec with DICOM uid and FHIR patient references.

Further, Ricardo, if you're willing to help with these examples, it would be awesome!

wmaethner commented on Issue #151:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
